1.SceneDescription:
Chandler, Phoebe, Rachel, Monica comforting Joey at Monica and Rachel's
apartment.

lines.Line:
When I was little, I wanted to be a veteranarian, but then I found out you had to
put your hands into cows and stuff

Yeah, yeah, just a tough day at work. A stegosaurus fell over and trapped a kid.
Whoa, whoa, I know this jacket, this is, th--Fun Bobby's jacket! Where is he, what. He,
he's here, isn't he
Fun Bobby (FBOB) enters from Monica's bedroom.
Hey. Whoa, hey, you've been working out, huh

Not at all! I love this guy. Hey, I was so psyched to hear you're back with my
sister
Hey, so what'd I miss, what'd I miss, c'mon
Oh, we were just trying to make Joey feel better
Hey, do you need me to pick you up
Hey, do you need me to pick you up

Hey no, seriously, I don't need you to pick me... [Fun Bobby picks Joey up off
the ground, bounces him. Joey laughs.] Alright! It still works

OK, now before I go, does anybody else need to be picked up? [everyone raises
their hands] I'm still gonna go
OK, I'll see you later babe
OK, I'll see you later babe

Uh, public display of affection coming up. You can avert your eyes. [kisses
Monica

lines.Character: [Chandler and Joey are watching, Rachel turns their heads away from Monica
lines.Line: Chandler and Joey are watching, Rachel turns their heads away from Monica.

Oh, isn't he? Oh, you know, I really think this time it may work with him. I
mean, he just makes me feel so good and I've been feeling so lousy this last couple of
months, no job, no boyfriend. Well, at least my cup is half full

And for our two-week anniversary, he's gonna take me to his cousin's cabin for
the weekend

We went through a lot of wine tonight, you guys. [walks over to table,
holding five empty wine bottles
Really? I only had two glasses
Really? I only had two glasses

I had about a mugful in this lovely 'I got boned at the Museum of Natural
History' mug
OK, so that's... that's what, two bottles? And yet somehow we went through five

lines.Character: [All look towards door Fun Bobby left through
lines.Line: All look towards door Fun Bobby left through.

lines.Character: [All look towards door Fun Bobby left through
lines.Line: All look towards door Fun Bobby left through.
[realizing what everyone else did a minute ago] Ooooooh
So what. So he drank a lot tonight

Yeah but, you know, now that I think about it, I don't think I've ever seen Fun
Bobby without a... a drink in his hand

Yeah. Oh, OOOH, yeah, you know, did you notice how he always starts his stories
with, um, OK, 'I was soooo wasted,' or, 'Oh, we were soooo bombed,' or, ummm, ooh, ooh,
'So I wake up, and I'm in this dumpster in Connecticut.
Monica, have you ever been with him when he wasn't drinking

Well, we just happen to go to alot of places where you might drink. I mean, how
do you go to a wine tasting without having a drink? Or... or to a club, or to the... zoo

2.SceneDescription: Estelle Leonard Talent Agency. Estelle (ESTL) is speaking on the phone.

lines.Line:
Stop saying you're not talented, you're very talented. It's just with the bird
dead and all, there's very little act left. Oh, honey, give me a break, will ya? [a knock
on the door] Oooh, ooh, I'll talk to you later
Well, there's my favorite client. So tell me darling, how was the audition
Well, I think it went pretty well. I.. I got a callback for Thursday
Joey, have you ever seen me ecstatic
Joey, have you ever seen me ecstatic
Well, here it is. [She almost smiles.

OK, uh.... listen, there's something I want to talk to you about. The network
casting lady..

Oh yeah, yeah, she's great, but... I kinda got the feeling that she was sort
of... coming on to me. And I definitely would get the part if I would've... you know... if
I would have sent the Little General in

Oh, I see. Well, I'm just gonna put in a call here and we'll find out what's
goin' on and straighten it out. [picks up the phone] Yeah, hi, Lori please. [pause] Hi
darling. So how 'bout Joey Tribbiani for the part of the cab driver, isn't he terrific?
[pause] Uh-huuuuh. [pause] Uh-huuuuh. OK, doll. Talk to you later. [hangs up] [to Joey]
Yeah, you're gonna have to sleep with her

3.SceneDescription:
Chandler and Joey's apartment. Joey is making marinara sauce and filling every
container in sight. Chandler enters.

lines.Line:
Whoa, whoa, so I'm guessing you didn't get the part, or... uh, Italy called and
said it was hungry
Well, the part's mine if I want it
Yeah, if I'm willing to sleep with the casting lady
[not knowing how to react] Oh my... God
Ten years I've been waiting for a break like this Chandler, ten years! I mean, Days of Our Lives. That's actually on television
Well, I guess I could sleep with her... I mean, how could I do that
Well, I... I've got a pop-up book that told me everything I need to know
I've never slept with someone for a part
I've never slept with someone for a part

Well is she... [reaches into the cookie jar for a cookie, takes his hand out,
covered with pasta sauce

Yeah, she's totally good looking. I mean, if I met her in a bar, or something,
I'd be buying her breakfast. [pause] You know, after having slept with her

Y'know, maybe this isn't such a big deal. Y'know, I mean, the way that I see it
is you get a great job and you get to have sex. Y'know, I mean, throw in a tree and
a fat guy and you've got Christmas

I just... I just don't think that I want it that way though, y'know? I mean,
let's say I do make it, alright? I'm always gonna look back and wonder if it was because
of my talent or because of.. y'know, the Little General
Didn't you used to call it the Little Major
Didn't you used to call it the Little Major
Yeah, but after Denise DeMarco, I had to promote it

4.SceneDescription: Central Perk. Chandler is sitting on the couch between Russ and Ross, doing a crossword puzzle.

lines.Line: Hey, we're having some fun now, huh, Ross? Wanna do another one, huh Russ? OK... eleven letters, atomic element number 101... ends in ium
And weenie number two has it. Unless, of course, nine-down, Knights in White Satin was sung by the Doody Blues

lines.Character: [Phoebe and Rachel are at the counter talking
lines.Line: Phoebe and Rachel are at the counter talking.
You don't see it? You actually don't see it
You don't see it? You actually don't see it

Phoebe, what the hell are you talking about? Other than their names being
similar, I'm sorry, I do not see what you're seeing

lines.Character: [They look over at Russ and Ross
lines.Line: They look over at Russ and Ross.

lines.Character: [They look over at Russ and Ross
lines.Line: They look over at Russ and Ross.
[to Russ] For your information, it's a card sharp, not a card shark
You could not be more wrong. You could try... but you would not be successful
OK, I'm gonna get some more coffee before the pinching and eye-poking begins
I know what your problem is
I know what your problem is
You're jealous because I'm a real doctor

Hey, you're a doctor of gums. That's the smallest body part you can major
in. It's like day one, floss. Day two, here's your diploma

5.SceneDescription: Central Perk. Russ enters. Chandler and Phoebe are sitting on the couch.

lines.Line: I guess you guys heard, Rachel dumped me

Oh, all she said was that I remind her too much of somebody. You have any idea
who she's talking about
Oh I do, it's.... it's Bob Saget. She hates him
Hey, Julie! Hey, how are you doing

Um, oh, I don't know. I mean, it's definitely weird not being with Ross, but I
guess I'm doing OK. Actually I've got some of his stuff that he, um...

lines.Character: [Russ and Julie look at each other with love in their eyes. The music builds..
lines.Line: Russ and Julie look at each other with love in their eyes. The music builds...
